name: Xplora 1: Peter Gabriel's Secret World
overview: Xplora 1: Peter Gabriel's Secret World is a multimedia piece by Peter Gabriel, made to promote his 1992 album, Us. It contains information about Gabriel himself, his record label and its artists, other projects, world music and more. The gaming elements include puzzles and treasure hunting. As the player completes puzzles and accomplishes goals new areas of the CD are unlocked featuring new content for the player to explore, including the ability to remix Peter Gabriel's music videos and joining in on jam sessions.
